text: W. Terry McBrayer (September 1, 1937 â€“ October 11, 2020) was an American lobbyist, attorney, and Democratic politician. He was born in Ironton, Ohio. He was a member of the Kentucky House of Representatives between 1966 until his retirement in 1976. McBrayer died on October 11, 2020 in Lexington, Kentucky from cancer, aged 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Kentucky Category:Lawyers from Kentucky Category:American lobbyists Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Kentucky Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:People from Lexington, Kentucky Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Ohio
title: Terry McBrayer
